name: Total Eclipse
description:
The word is out, chummer. If you want blazing rock and roll, there's only one band to see: The Elementals. The buzz is they're about to become the next local band hit the big time
There's just one problem. The elementals have broken their recording contract, and in the world of corporate domination, nobody goes solo.
The runners' job? Find the band and bring them home. Alive.
